visible_files.cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *Test*.class
CLASSES=.:`ls *.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -cp $CLASSES  *.java   
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`  
fi
visible_files.instructions:
This is an instructor-led exercise with no written instructions.
Your instructor will explain the exercise.
